words.def: decapod having eyes on short stalks and a broad flattened carapace with a small abdomen folded under the thorax and pincers
a compartment at the front of a motor vehicle or locomotive where driver sits
One who engages in arbitrage, an arbitrageur.
electrical conduction through a gas in an applied electric field
a room or establishment where alcoholic drinks are served over a counter
an undergarment worn by women to support their breasts
a motor vehicle with four wheels
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
a colorless and odorless inert gas
